name: Pipe Escape
description:
Pipe Escape is a tight controlled 2D puzzle game where the only objective is to escape a labyrinth of pipes whilst in a constant state of spin.

Work with the spin, not against it.



Encounter the challenges that await in the maze of leaky pipes.



The pipes are inhabited by bats and you are not welcome.



Find your way to an exit through the depths of this pipe hell!
